user.title: Entity Selection
user.description: Select the entities that provide data for the electricity planner.

data_description.current_price_entity: Current electricity price from Nord Pool integration
data_description.highest_price_entity: Highest electricity price today from Nord Pool
data_description.lowest_price_entity: Lowest electricity price today from Nord Pool
data_description.next_price_entity: Next hour electricity price from Nord Pool
data_description.nordpool_config_entry: Select the Nord Pool config entry to enable full interval price data
data_description.battery_soc_entities: Entities providing battery state of charge (%)
data_description.house_consumption_entity: Current house power consumption in W
data_description.monthly_grid_peak_entity: Current month grid peak in W for power management

data_description.min_soc_threshold: Minimum battery charge level to maintain (%)
data_description.emergency_soc_threshold: SOC level below which emergency charging is triggered regardless of price (%)
data_description.grid_battery_charging_limit_soc: SOC level above which grid battery charging becomes very selective - prefers solar over grid (%)
data_description.very_low_price_threshold: Percentage of daily price range considered 'very low' (e.g., 30 = bottom 30%)
data_description.significant_solar_threshold: Solar surplus power level considered significant enough to prefer over grid (W)
data_description.feedin_price_threshold: Price threshold above which solar export to grid is enabled (€/kWh)

set_manual_override.name: Set Manual Override
set_manual_override.description: Force battery or car charging decisions (charge or wait) for a specified duration.

entry_id.name: Config Entry ID
entry_id.description: Optional config entry ID of the Electricity Planner instance (required when multiple instances are configured).

target.name: Target
target.description: Which system to override: battery, car, or both.

action.name: Action
action.description: Force charge (enable charging) or force wait (disable charging).

duration.name: Duration
duration.description: Override duration in minutes (1-1440). Optional - omit for indefinite override.

reason.name: Reason
reason.description: Optional reason for the override (for logging and diagnostics).

clear_manual_override.name: Clear Manual Override
clear_manual_override.description: Remove active manual overrides and return to automatic decision making.

entry_id.name: Config Entry ID
entry_id.description: Optional config entry ID of the Electricity Planner instance (required when multiple instances are configured).

target.name: Target
target.description: Which system to clear: battery, car, or both (default: both).
